Description: Data on the number of households applying to local authorities for housing assistance and the number of homeless households in temporary accommodation.
Name: Homelessness statistics
Route from landing page to data: Data can be found on this landing page as 4 Power BI data sets.
Sizing Notes: Available through the odata route, so simple to get, but may need a number of separate downloads / produce a number of different data sets, so needs a fair amount of up-front analysis
